reviewText: Funny movie, not as good as the first Pink Panther with Steve Martin but close. I like the first and second movie with Steve Martin better than the original Pink Panther movies. Too bad they changed actors from Kevin Kline, I think, from the first movie.
The movie itself is 5 stars.  However, the case was damaged in mail and the video makes a strange sound for the first 15 minutes on any player.
New in the box just as discribed .
